item.title: Report E-2025010043
item.description:
Report E-2025010043

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T00:58:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-05
  • City: FIFE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 16:50 PM ET, UTA contacted the call center to report a spill that occurred in a trailer in Fife, WA. The spill consisted of 2-5 gallon metal pails due to a puncture in the pails, cause unknown. The spill was approximately 12 ounces and was contained to the sides of the containers and the shrink-wrap. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the terminal, who stated they placed the pails and the shrink wrap in (1)35-gallon metal drum with plastic lining.

item.title: Report E-2024120439
item.description:
Report E-2024120439

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-26
  • City: FIFE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 15:37 ET, XPO notified the Call Center of a cargo release at terminal UTA. It was reported that approximately 2 gallons of UPOL SYSTEM 20 4:1 SPOT/PANEL CLEARCOAT UP2892 released from three 1-gallon cans due to improper loading. The release impacted trailer #5996366. Terminal personnel had already cleaned up the product before contacting the call center. Waste label 222638-1 was created, one 35-gallon metal drum containing thirteen carboard boxes, three cans, one plastic bag with oil dri and absorbed product, and protective gloves.

item.title: Report X-2024121250
item.description:
Report X-2024121250

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-09
  • City: SEA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment had flown on freighter 7096 from JNU-SEA. Would then transfer onto a pax planes from SEA to MIA as it's final destination. Shipment had not been screened since it flew on a freighter which led to SEA having to screen the shipment themselves so it could be manifested to its flight to MIA. Discovery was found during x ray and physical search screening. --- submission delayed due to obtaining the photos. 67 photos being sent to FAA with this,
